annotations.description: Excited to bring you guys this rather obscure scotch and cream cocktail. Another good one around the holiday and should definitely make it into your cocktail...
annotations.title: Master The Classics : Athol Brose

textContent:
1.5oz Blended Scotch
.75oz Honey Syrup
Top hand whipped heavy cream
Garnish with Nutmeg

Stir scotch and syrup. 
Top with cream. 
Garnish with nutmeg. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_yAAmdN2KVM
title: Athol Brose
